Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Vancomycin
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panel with Vancomycin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine antimicrobial agent susceptibility of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci, including vancomycin at specified concentrations
